Team Power, Real Rewards

üí• The countdown to @itlx_defi is on, and this is your reminder: the future of trading isn‚Äôt solo. It‚Äôs collective.

ITLX is building a system where you can team up with others to earn real rewards in $USDC.
Every verified action from you and your network adds up, turning collaboration into measurable milestones.

This allows you to build your own model similar to a Broker Company in the crypto world, with almost zero cost and a stable monthly revenue stream generated through your team‚Äôs performance.

Whether you‚Äôre just starting your journey or leading a growing squad, every move matters.
Each transaction pushes your team closer to the next Tier, and each Tier means real, on-chain rewards waiting to be unlocked.

 Tier Milestones üëá
üèÜ Tier 1  $8 910 / Month
üåê Tier 2  $2 295 / Month

üí° Note:
When you reach a higher Tier, you can also receive the rewards from all lower Tiers, maximizing your total monthly earnings.

How your Tier is calculated:
Your own trading volume + your direct team‚Äôs volume (F1) + 20% of your indirect team‚Äôs volume (F2).

Together, these layers form the ITLX ecosystem that rewards real people for real participation.
No bots. No speculation. Just verified network power, tracked transparently on-chain.

text:
Launched construction of the 20km Emali-Matiliku road, part of the 42km Emali-Ukia road, Ndundune, Makueni County.

The KSh1.1 billion project will open up key market access points by linking Kativani, Manywani, Matiliku, Kalamba, Nziu, and Ukia trading centres, and Wote town onward to Kajiado, Nairobi, and Mombasa.

It will reduce transport costs, expand trade in perishable goods and livestock products, and enable farmers to reach markets more quickly, cutting post-harvest losses and increasing their earnings.
